faqs.question: The app is loading slowly. What should I do?
faqs.answer: Slow loading can be caused by: 1) Browser cache issues - try clearing cache/cookies, 2) Network connectivity - check your internet connection, 3) Large files - reduce file sizes or archive old files, 4) Browser extensions - disable extensions and try again. If issues persist, try a different browser or contact support with details about your setup.

faqs.question: I'm getting an 'Upload Failed' error. How do I fix it?
faqs.answer: Upload failures typically occur when: 1) File size exceeds limits (max 2GB per file on Basic, 5GB on Professional, 10GB on Enterprise), 2) Poor network connection - try uploading on a stable connection, 3) Browser timeout - for large files, use our desktop app instead, or 4) Storage quota exceeded - free up space or upgrade your plan.

faqs.question: Can I use your service offline?
faqs.answer: Limited offline functionality is available through our desktop and mobile apps (Professional and Enterprise plans only). You can: 1) Mark specific files for offline access, 2) View and edit offline files, 3) Changes sync automatically when you reconnect. The web app requires an internet connection. Offline storage limits: 5GB mobile, 50GB desktop.

faqs.question: What browsers do you support?
faqs.answer: We support the latest versions of: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend Chrome or Firefox for the best experience. Internet Explorer is not supported. Mobile browsers: Safari (iOS 14+) and Chrome (Android 10+). Some features may have limited functionality on older browsers.

faqs.question: How do I report a bug?
faqs.answer: To report a bug: 1) Click the Help icon in the bottom right, 2) Select 'Report Bug', 3) Describe what happened and what you expected, 4) Include steps to reproduce the issue, 5) Attach screenshots if helpful, 6) Submit the report. Our team will investigate and update you on progress. Critical bugs are prioritized immediately.

faqs.question: The app keeps logging me out. Why?
faqs.answer: Automatic logouts occur when: 1) 7 days of inactivity (security measure), 2) You log in from a different device/browser, 3) Your password was recently changed, or 4) Browser is clearing cookies. To stay logged in longer, enable 'Remember Me' at login and check your browser isn't clearing cookies on close.

faqs.question: Can I use your service on mobile?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have native mobile apps for iOS (App Store) and Android (Google Play). Features include: offline access to starred files, push notifications, camera upload, biometric login, and document scanning. The mobile web version also works well for basic tasks. Mobile apps are free with any subscription.

faqs.question: My files aren't syncing. How do I fix this?
faqs.answer: Sync issues can be resolved by: 1) Check internet connection, 2) Ensure desktop app is running and logged in, 3) Check for app updates (Settings > About), 4) Verify you haven't exceeded storage quota, 5) Restart the sync app, 6) Check sync settings for excluded folders. If problems persist, click 'Force Sync' in app settings.

faqs.question: What file types do you support?
faqs.answer: We support all file types for storage. For preview/editing: Documents (PDF, DOCX, TXT, MD), Images (JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG), Videos (MP4, MOV, WebM), Audio (MP3, WAV), Code (all major languages), Spreadsheets (XLSX, CSV), and Presentations (PPTX). Unsupported types can still be stored and downloaded.

faqs.question: How secure is my data?
faqs.answer: Your data security includes: 1) 256-bit AES encryption at rest, 2) TLS 1.3 encryption in transit, 3) SOC 2 Type II certified infrastructure, 4) Regular third-party security audits, 5) Automatic backups every 6 hours, 6) Optional two-factor authentication, and 7) Geographic redundancy. We never access your data without permission.
